effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: One ally within 10 squares of the ground commander can make a free strike.

A target who has I<2 and who is adjacent to the ground commander after this ability is resolved is grabbed (save ends). This grab can't be escaped using the Escape Grab maneuver. The ground commander can grab up to two creatures at a time.

items.name: Highest Posthumous Promotion
items.target: Each war dog in the area

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Any target who has a loyalty collar is reduced to 0 Stamina.

items.name: Final Orders
items.trigger: The target takes damage, is force moved, or is reduced to 0 Stamina.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Even if reduced to 0 Stamina, the target moves up to their speed and can make a free strike after the triggering effect is resolved. The target then immediately dies.
At the end of each of their turns, the ground commander can take 5 damage to end one effect on them that can be ended by a saving throw. This damage can't be reduced in any way.
When the ground commander is reduced to 0 Stamina, their loyalty collar explodes, dealing 2d6 damage to each adjacent enemy and object.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each target can make a ranged free strike, then immediately use the Charge main action.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each ally within 5 squares of the target moves up to their speed and can make a free strike against the target. If the target has I<2, they are frightened of the ground commander (save ends).

items.name: Claim Them for the Body Banks

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Each target ally shifts up to 2 squares and can use the Grab maneuver. Until the end of the encounter, each target enemy takes a bane on the Escape Grab maneuver.
